e2e81e3d-16cd-4da9-9de9-989ecb6b91d3.description: The CyberArk Community Most Valuable Professional (MVP) badge is rewarded to our top contributors within the CyberArk Technical Community site. MVP’s are nominated by the CyberArk Community Leadership team based on an individual(s) having demonstrated the following qualities: exceptional teamwork, collaboration, technical thought leadership as well as leading by example regarding granting social belonging to members, welcome newcomers to the technical community and quality in their postings.
e2e81e3d-16cd-4da9-9de9-989ecb6b91d3.name: CyberArk Community Most Valuable Professional (MVP) badge
